entries.title: Sketch Data Studio Plugin
entries.description: A plugin for Sketch that generates dummy data and charts

entries.title: Jade/Stylus Bootstrap
entries.description: Gruntfile and npm package to get a jade/stylus-based project up and running

entries.title: Color Calendar
entries.description: A color calendar that fills in as time passes. Inspired by 'A Colorful New Year', a poster by Niklaus Troxler. This is a work in progress! Best viewed with a large window size.

entries.title: HSL Color Picker
entries.description: An HSL colorpicker built in D3.

entries.title: Leaderboard
entries.description: A leaderboard designed to update with incoming data.
